sentence.Network_en: Her grandmother had the gift of making people happy.
sentence.Network_cn: 她奶奶有逗人开心的本事。

sentence.Network_en: They are naturally good salesmen with the gift of the gab.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们天生就是能说会道的推销能手。

sentence.Network_en: The surprise gift is a thankyou for our help.
sentence.Network_cn: 这份意外的礼物是为了感谢我们给予的帮助。

list.abs: ... ◆ 典礼[  ceremony celebration ] ◆ 定礼[ bride-price betrothal gift ] ◆ 队礼[  salute of the Chinese Young Pioneers ].

means.word_mean: 1. a wedding present to the bride
